#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

  int a,b,rez;

  scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
  while(a||b)
  {
    rez = 0;
    while(a&&b)
    {
      if(a%10 + b%10 > 9)
        rez++;
      a /= 10;
      b /= 10;
    }
    switch(rez)
    {
      case 0: printf("No carry operation.\n");
              break;
      case 1: printf("1 carry operation.\n");
              break;
      default: printf("%d carry operations.\n", rez);
    }

    scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
  }

  return 0;
}
